text:
Message 1341 of 4024
It’s not a number. That’s either an sms or mms. This is an iOS alert. Just like with the “you know what”incident. Xfinity brokers that handshake with
Apple.
It has nothing to do with ATT. Neither did the other. And it is frustrating. Apple iOS sees a trigger in the cloud and pumps it out to my MAC
address.
Stuff happens in the service and even I don’t always grok the trigger. But in both cases, we know what made those fire. We just don’t know how to
stop it.
It’s not going to kill us as long as I don’t go to jail or loose future employability for it. So as long as we agree I can even stop putting myself in danger.
Just let me know. This is obviously one of the running list items I realized should go through Lisa, but felt like you and I could potentially just
cooperate on.
I want to get back to a place of trust with you. But till then, with Anna Lisa in play, it’s very scary to me. I’ll follow your lead, Christine and hope for
the best.
Sent:02/12/2024 at 06:46 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/12/2024 at 07:53 PM)
Subject:Re: Still getting alerts
Message 1342 of 4024
Adrian is trying to get in. When I use the family info I have it says I am on the account but still asks me to sign up. So if you see this you might ping
him. But I suggested he start with Max while you are out.
Sent:02/12/2024 at 08:28 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/13/2024 at 09:14 AM)
Subject:Disney Plus
Message 1343 of 4024
So... I’m asking how we proceed given my legal liabilities. If I see you read this, know I’m over a barrel trying to help you, but you don’t say anything
still, I get nervous. If should address through attorneys I can. I was just hoping to peacefully cooperate.
Sent:02/12/2024 at 08:36 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/13/2024 at 09:17 AM)
Subject:Re: Still getting alerts
Message 1344 of 4024
Hey There!
Hoping we can make legit progress tomorrow. Today we were kind to each other and that is a fantastic start, but it proves the point again that OFW
doesn't work. It took an entire day and the only two things we accomplished other than kindness were 1) I'll go through my previous emails and make

Subject:Re: Touch Base
